document.full_text: preliminary findings from the recorders of an air france jet that crashed into the atlantic ocean in 2009 have found that the pilots became distracted with malfunctioning airspeed indicators and failed to properly manage other critical systems, the wall street journal reported, citing people familiar with the matter.
document.title: black boxes indicate pilot error in air france crash: report
lines_and_colors: preliminary findings from the recorders of an air france jet that crashed into the atlantic ocean in 2009 have found that the pilots became distracted with malfunctioning airspeed indicators and failed to properly manage other critical systems, the wall street journal reported, citing people familiar with the matter.
